page.title: 08MAINS OF MURTHLY FARM
page.content: Mr. McDairmid is very busy from {March to May}sowing all his spring crops. From{August to October},he is busy harvesting cereals and lifting potatoes.He is also harvesting his Winter Barley and as soon as it is off,the plough goes in. A typical day would be{:7.30am-}make sure the men start work,check cattle. {9.00am-}office,check mail,make/answer phone calls. {10.30am-}check workers, handle problems,lunch,office,future plans. {5.00pm-}workers stop,check farm, office. {6.30pm-}stop for the night.
